entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
